column4: Median Time to Degree for Recipients
1. Cognitive Neuroscience is an admitting program. As an
admitting program, students may apply and be admitted directly
to this program, but the Ph.D. degree is offered only through
one of the following departments: Biochemistry, Biology, Cell
Biology, Immunology, Molecular Genetics and Microbiology,
Neurobiology, Pathology, Pharmacology and Cancer Biology.
